feed.title: GitHub R Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of R in GitHub

entry.title: rstudio/shinyapps-package-dependencies
entry.summary:
Collection of bash scripts that install R package system dependencies

shinyapps-package-dependencies

Some R packages require other software and libraries to be installed on the host server in order for the R package to function. This repository is used in shinyapps.io to install those dependencies if a user's shinyapp utilizes an R package that requires other libraries/software to be install.

To contribute to this repository, read CONTRIBUTING.md

If you'd like to request the addition of support of a specific R package, open a github issue.

entry.title: sysbio-bioinf/MOCCA
entry.summary:
Multi-objective selection for collecting cluster alternatives

test installation with: R CMD INSTALL --library=Rlib src/MOCCA

compile a package with: R CMD build src/MOCCA

in R run: library(MOCCA,lib.loc="Rlib")
